attributes.action: Make Dog registration &  lead wearing law for all Dogs.
attributes.additional_details: With the dog type exemption in place with on a lead and muzzle, I call for all dogs to be kept on leads, as type exempt dogs don't have a chance to defend against dogs running off lead who attack  defenceless muzzled dogs, this is an unfair advantage to dogs who in the main are very nice natured, it's very unfair, so make fair for all breeds & owners to have same advantages,
attributes.background: Make the laws fair for all dogs and owners to be responsible for there dogs big or small, make them also accountable, as they can all bite or mame,

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions:

Require all dogs to be on a lead when on public pavements: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644312

Make it compulsory for all dogs to be on leads on public land: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650650

Bring back a Dog Licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
